    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f7-1180-40f5-2c31-6fbf4dde002d#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Mateóci Szent István és Szent László szobrok, 1500 körül, Magyar Nemzeti Galéria, magasságuk 114 és 106,5 cm, festett fa.</string>
            <string language="en">Mateóci St. István and St. László statues, about 1500, Hungarian National Gallery, their height 114 and 106,5 cm, painted wood.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mateóci Str. István und Str. László Statuen, 
ungefähr 1500, ungarische nationale Galerie, ihre Höhe 114 und 106.5
Zentimeter, gemaltes Holz.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Statues de rue István et de rue László de 
Mateóci, environ 1500, galerie nationale hongroise, leur taille 114 
et 106.5 centimètres, bois peint.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estátuas do St. István e do St. László de 
Mateóci, aproximadamente 1500, galeria nacional hungarian, sua altura
114 e 106.5 cm, madeira pintada.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Statue della st István e della st László di 
Mateóci, circa 1500, galleria nazionale ungherese, le loro altezze 
114 e 106.5 centimetri, legno verniciato.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Mateσci ST Istvαn και αγάλματα του ST 
Lαszlσ, περίπου 1500, ουγγρική εθνική στοά, το ύψος τους 
114 και 106.5 εκατ., χρωματισμένο ξύλο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estatuas del St. István y del St. László de 
Mateóci, cerca de 1500, galería nacional húngara, su altura 114 y 
106.5 centímetros, madera pintada.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Két, udvari öltözéket viselő szakállas férfi, az egyik koronás, festésük lekopott.</string>
            <string language="en">Two, bearded man wearing courtlike costume, one is crowned, their painting abraded.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">faszobor,  14.század,  15.század,  Szent István,  Szent László,  Magyar Nemzeti Galéria,  gótikus szobrászat,  </string>
            <string language="en">statue of wood, 14th century, 15th century, St. István, St. László, Hungarian National Gallery, gothic statuary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei, bärtiger Mann tragendes courtlike Kostüm, man wird
gekrönt, ihr abgeschliffener Anstrich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux, le costume de port de courtlike d'homme barbu, un 
est couronnés, leur peinture endommagée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois, traje desgastando do courtlike do homem bearded, um 
são coroados, sua pintura abradada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due, costume da portare del courtlike dell'uomo barbuto, 
uno crowned, la loro pittura raspata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο, γενειοφόρο άτομο που φορούν το ευγενές 
κοστούμι, ένα στέφονται, η ζωγραφική τους που εκτρίβεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se corona dos, traje del courtlike del hombre que desgasta
barbudo, uno, su pintura desgastada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statue des Holzes, 14. Jahrhundert, 15. Jahrhundert, Str. 
István, Str. László, ungarische nationale Galerie, gotisches 
statuary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statue de bois, 14ème siècle, 15ème siècle, rue István, rue
László, galerie nationale hongroise, statuaire gothique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estátua da madeira, 1ô século, 1ö século, St. István, St. 
László, galeria nacional hungarian, statuary gothic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statua di legno, quattordicesimo secolo, quindicesimo secolo, st
István, st László, galleria nazionale ungherese, statuario gotico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άγαλμα του ξύλου, 14$ος αιώνας, 15$ος αιώνας, ST 
Istvαn, ST Lαszlσ, ουγγρική εθνική στοά, γοτθικός 
αγαλματώδης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estatua de la madera, 14to siglo, décimo quinto siglo, St. 
István, St. László, galería nacional húngara, statuary gótico</string>
          </keyword>
